title: doc: document go build file types
body:
by **cardboard42**: 
There does not seem to be any official documentation for the various file types that go
build handles besides .go files such as .s, .syso, .swig, etc. I checked the go tool
documentation, the wiki, and How To Write Go Code.

In particular syso files should be mentioned as they are very useful to windows
developers as a way to embed manifests, icon files, and other useful things.

The only mention of syso I found was in the templating structure for go list.
